text.p: European Commission chief spokesman Nikolaus van der Pas defended Industry Commissioner Martin Bangemann on Thursday, saying he played an active role in Commission meetings.
"Mr Bangemann is almost always there," he told a news briefing. "I would also add, very objectively, that Mr Bangemann is there participating very actively in the work."

Van der Pas was responding to complaints about Bangemann's reaction at a news conference on Wednesday when he was asked by a German journalist if it was true Commission President Jacques Santer had asked him to be more active and present within the Commission.
Bangemann described the question as "rubbish" and walked out.
Journalists told van der Pas the commissioner's behaviour was inappropriate.
